metadata.title: CVE-2017-9260 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The TDStretchSSE::calcCrossCorr function in source/SoundTouch/sse_optimized.cpp in SoundTouch 1.9.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted wav file. It was discovered that SoundTouch incorrectly handled certain WAV files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: soundtouch package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-3').
